Html: The RSVP "Current Signed Up" total does not count the current user when they rsvp. The "Yes/No" buttons give errors if they are clicked multiple times.

Hmmm.... looks like there needs to be a check to whether the user has signed-up or not.

The # of guests needs to include them. No way arround it... it might be confusing, but there is a note in the documentation I am working on about that.
